          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy transfer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübertragung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transfert d'énergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transferência de energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasferimento di energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργειακή μεταφορά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transferencia de energía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how much useful energy in the form of heat and light is transferred from electricity.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wieviel nützliche Energie 
in Form von Hitze und Licht von der Elektrizität übertragen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre combien d'énergie utile sous
forme de chaleur et de lumière est transférée à partir de 
l'électricité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra quanto energia útil no 
formulário do calor e da luz é transferida da eletricidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra quanto energia utile sotto 
forma di calore e luce è trasferita da elettricità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει πόση χρήσιμη ενέργεια 
υπό μορφή θερμότητας και φωτός μεταφέρεται από την ηλεκτρική 
ενέργεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cuánto energía útil en la
forma de calor y de luz se transfiere de electricidad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
